name: Nothing to do (GoodChicken)
description:
There's nothing to do here, explore the map and have fun moving around! (PD: One of your friends is hidden somewhere, try to find it!).

Controls:
AD - Move
Spacebar - Jump
Left Click (While in the air)- Fly 
Right Click - Change Gravity

Game made for the LMOB Beginner's Game jam #14, with the theme "Nothing". 

Assets credits:

Sprites: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-forest-108124

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/action-rpg-music-free-85434

Sound effects: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/sound-fx-retro-pack-121743
